post.title: connecting sammy ps50c680 to ps3 for 3d
post.content: hi there. for some reason i cannot unlock any 3d modes on the tv. i only have the crappy tv 3d conversion which is terrible. has anyone set-up their ps3 to run 3d content? please help if possible. samsung tech support are impossible to get hold of. i have the latest firmware upgrade on ps3. thanks in advance.
